description:
At Burger Law, clients will find aggressive and knowledgeable counsel for a wide range of matters pertaining to personal injury. Gary Burger and the other attorneys at the law firm are dedicated to achieving positive results for those wrongfully injured in St. Louis and throughout Missouri. This experienced law office knows how a serious accident can impact your life in various ways, which is why they seek compensation for individuals who have been injured in the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Work accidents
  • Other personal injury accidents
  • Medical Malpractice
  • Wrongful Death

If you suffered injuries at work or as a direct result of the reckless or negligent actions of another individual, you have the right to seek compensation. The personal injury and workers’ compensation claims processes can be complex, but your chances of success increase dramatically when you secure the representation of an attorney who is unafraid to zealously advocate for your rights and interests. We've won over $50 million for our clients' injuries, and $113.7 million for Missouri Corrections Officers. We'll keep fighting for our clients until they get the compensation they deserve.

The team at Burger Law has the resources needed to thoroughly investigate your case and build a strong claim on your behalf. The attorneys at the law firm understand the difficulties that their clients face while dealing with insurance representatives and medical needs, which is why they strive to make the claims process as easy as possible. By taking advantage of a free initial case evaluation, you will learn how you can claim the full amount of recompense you deserve.
